participant_1.background:
I am proud of my ability to find affordable and delicious food at the deli.
I've been enjoying my new hobbies of rock collecting and macaroni art.
i got married when i was young.
i enjoy electronic music.
I got to go on a road trip with my siblings to celebrate my birthday.

participant_2.background:
The weather is not usually a factor when I am outside looking for wildlife.
i enjoy reading and walking on sunny days.
I love the smell of beans, but my stomach doesn't.
I remember watching the Olympics with my family and dreaming of being an Olympian myself.
my favorite band is radiolead.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
Pretty good! Just woke up, going to go for a walk soon.
Nice! I'm still in bed. What do you like to do for walks?
I like to look for wildlife, and I love reading. What are your hobbies?
I just got into rock collecting and macaroni art. I also love electronic music. What's your favorite band?
Nice! I love the smell of beans, but my stomach doesn't. What do you like about electronic music?
I love how it makes me feel. It's so upbeat and energetic. It helps me get motivated to do things.
I can see how that would be good for motivation! Do you listen to any live music?
I saw Radiolead live last year and it was amazing! They are my favorite band.
Oh, nice! I've heard good things about them. I'll have to check them out.
You should! They're great! I'm going to go get ready for my walk now. Nice talking to you!
You too! Have a great day
